protocol_name: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
protocol_name_html: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
before_start: 7 hour IL-3A virus infected NC64A, pellets frozen at -80°C
guidelines:
MATERIALS AND ASSAY CONDITIONS:

1) 7 hour IL-3A virus infected NC64A, pellets frozen at -80°C
2) Buffer A:
  • 10 mM Tris-Acetate, pH 8.0
  • 10 mM 2-M
  • 50 µg/mL PMSF
3) Buffer B:
  • 20 mM Tris-Acetate, pH 8.0
  • 0.5 mM EDTA
  • 7 mM 2-ME,10% Glycerol
4) Buffer B, pH 8.5:
  • 20 mM Tris-Acetate, pH 8.5
  • 0.5 mM EDTA
  • 7 mM 2-ME
5) Storage buffer:
  • 20 mM Tris-Acetate, pH 8.0
  • 0.5 mM EDTA
  • 0.1 mM DTT
  • 50 mM KOAc
  • 5 mM MgAc, 50% Glycerol
  • 100 µg/mL BSA (the BSA is added after dialysis into the storage buffer from a 10 mg/mL stock)
6) 4 M NaCl
7) 28% Polyethyleneglycol (PEG) 8000
8) Assay buffer and conditions:
       1X CviJI assay buffer:
  • 20 mM GlycylGlycine, pH 8.5 (with KOH)
  • 10 mM MgAc
  • 0.1 mM DTT
  • 50 mM KOAc
  • 100 µg/mL casein (optional)
All assays are carried out in 20.0 µL volumes with 1 µg of pUC19 DNA as substrate for 60 to 120 min at 25°C. The assays are electrophoresed on 2.0% agarose gels (100 mL gels with double 20 lane combs) for 1 hour at 100 volts in 1X TPE buffer. Gels are stained with 0.5 µg/mL ethidium bromide for 30 min and photographed on a UV light box.

components.data: Store the enzyme at -20°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Store the enzyme at -20°C.

components.data: Thaw 7 hour IL-3A virus infected NC64A chlorella and suspend in MSK flasks with Buffer A.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Thaw 7 hour IL-3A virus infected NC64A chlorella and suspend in MSK flasks with Buffer A.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.annotation: Suspend with 20 mL per flask per 1.0-1.5 X 10<sup>11</sup> infected cells.
source_data.thread_text: Suspend with 20 mL per flask per 1.0-1.5 X 10<sup>11</sup> infected cells.
source_data.body: Suspend with 20 mL per flask per 1.0-1.5 X 10<sup>11</sup> infected cells.

components.data: Recover the homogenate to clean tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Recover the homogenate to clean tubes.

components.data: Adjust the homogenate supernatant to 70% saturation with (NH<sub>4</sub>)<sub>2</sub>SO<sub>4</sub> at 4°C with gentle stirring.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Adjust the homogenate supernatant to 70% saturation with (NH<sub>4</sub>)<sub>2</sub>SO<sub>4</sub> at 4°C with gentle stirring.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 12 of CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella

components.data: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm 10 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm 10 min, 4°C.

components.data: Suspend the pellets with Buffer A.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Suspend the pellets with Buffer A.

components.data: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the material in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C.

components.data: Dilute the supernatant with 10-15 volumes of Buffer B to reduce the NaCl concentration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute the supernatant with 10-15 volumes of Buffer B to reduce the NaCl concentration.

components.data: Elute the Heparin-Sepharose column with Buffer B using a 0-2.0 M KOAc gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Elute the Heparin-Sepharose column with Buffer B using a 0-2.0 M KOAc gradient.

components.data: Elute the Blue-Sepharose column with Buffer B using a 0-2.0 M KOAc gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Elute the Blue-Sepharose column with Buffer B using a 0-2.0 M KOAc gradient.

components.data: Dilute the pooled fractions with 10-15 volumes of Buffer B, pH 8.5 to reduce the salt concentration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute the pooled fractions with 10-15 volumes of Buffer B, pH 8.5 to reduce the salt concentration.

components.data: Elute the Q-Sepharose column with Buffer B, pH 8.5 using a 0-2.0 M KOAc gradient.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Elute the Q-Sepharose column with Buffer B, pH 8.5 using a 0-2.0 M KOAc gradient.

components.data: Concentrate the pooled enzyme by dialysis overnight into storage buffer at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Concentrate the pooled enzyme by dialysis overnight into storage buffer at 4°C.

components.data: Homogenize the cells in the MSK mechanical homogenizer with 15 gm of 0.3 mm glass beads at 4,000 rpm for 90 sec (2 X 45 sec) with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Homogenize the cells in the MSK mechanical homogenizer with 15 gm of 0.3 mm glass beads at 4,000 rpm for 90 sec (2 X 45 sec) with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.

components.data: Wash the glass beads 3X with 5 mL of Buffer A and combine with the homogenate.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the glass beads 3X with 5 mL of Buffer A and combine with the homogenate.

components.data: Centrifuge the homogenate in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 20 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the homogenate in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 20 min, 4°C.

components.data: Save the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save the supernatant.

components.data: Incubate at 4°C for 60-90 min without stirring.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 4°C for 60-90 min without stirring.

components.data: Save the pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save the pellet.

components.data: Per mL of suspension add: 0.45 mL of 4 M NaCl and 0.45 mL of 28% PEG 8000 (heated to 65°C).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Per mL of suspension add: 0.45 mL of 4 M NaCl and 0.45 mL of 28% PEG 8000 (heated to 65°C).

components.data: Mix gently by inversion for 5-10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix gently by inversion for 5-10 min.

components.data: Save the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Save the supernatant.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 20 of CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: CviJI Purification From IL-3A Virus Infected NC64A Chlorella
source_data.annotation: If there is small particulate matter in the supernatant, centrifuge a second time as before and save the supernatant.
source_data.thread_text: If there is small particulate matter in the supernatant, centrifuge a second time as before and save the supernatant.
source_data.body: If there is small particulate matter in the supernatant, centrifuge a second time as before and save the supernatant.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Load the material overnight onto a Heparin-Sepharose column equilibrated with Buffer B in the cold room.
